experiment¶

Entry point for manipulating Experiments. Provides the following operations:

Command-line usage¶

usage: experiment [-h] [-c | -d]
                  {list,desc,run,lock,unlock,alg-runs,build-ks-gamma} targets
                  [targets ...]

Positional Arguments¶

operation

Possible choices: list, desc, run, lock, unlock, alg-runs, build-ks-gamma

The operation to be performed on the targets.

Default: “list”

targets

The experiment to perform the operation on.

Default: [‘all’]

Named Arguments¶

-c, --print-to-csv
 

Load saved AlgorithmRun instances and convert them to CSV.

Default: “print_to_csv”

-d, --delete

Delete saved AlgorithmRun instances.

Default: “print_to_csv”

Defined operations¶

Each Experiment operation is represented by a callback with the conventional name op_[OperationName]. Each such callback receives a list of Experiment definition names, representing the Experiments to act on.
